title: The EU - India FTA opens doors for textiles , but compliance could be the key
description: The India–EU free trade pact will be judged not only by tariff lines and market size but by whether India’s textile supply chains can show cleaner water, safer work and lower emissions at scale., The India–EU free trade pact will be judged not only by tariff lines and market size but by whether India’s textile supply chains can show cleaner water, safer work and lower emissions at scale.
